reviews.review_msg: Shes an amazing lecturer and the material the she tests you on is covered in class, as well as the assigned readings. She goes through the material in-depth and connects to it what is happening right now.
As a science major, Defne made this a very easy to understand class. It was very enjoyable and the content was interesting. Highly recommend her.
Pretty easy course with digestible and straightforward topics. Lecture recordings can be long and repetitive but that is just her way of teaching. Great attitude and provides help when necessary
She's an amazing professor. During her lecture you can see she is passionate about what she teaches and gives great examples.

Professor Mukherjee was very nice and made it as clear as possible what would be on midterms and finals and how he would grade them. He also brought in snacks for the class frequently. However, it wasn't uncommon for his lectures to be unclear at times and a little disorganized/aimless, so read the textbook if you want to make sure of everything.
Took his class because of his good reviews and was not disappointed, model professor and also a great guy.

David is an unreal prof, I would take any class with him in a heartbeat! His lectures are super informative and engaging, I was actually excited to come to class everyday. He is super knowledgeable and funny, he has very clear grading criteria, he gives very helpful feedback, and he is super approachable and kind. I cannot recommend David enough!!!

Prest has been one of my favourite profs in political science so far. He is very understanding and very accessible. Nothing he gives as an assignment is unfair or unreasonable, just listen to lectures and do whatever is required and you'll get an A

Out of all my time in university I can say Stewart was by far the best professor I've ever had. He is super fair when it comes to marking and helps you throughout the course by opening your mind to any alternatives you may not have thought about in the world of politics. When we transitioned to online classes, Stewart was cooperative/respectful.
Stewart was very accommodating while transitioning to online classes this semester. Out of all the profs I had, his online course structure was the best.

I enjoyed having Sanjay as a professor! He's still working out some kinks in the course, but the experience was pretty smooth overall. Very clear with what his expectations are regarding tests/assignments. No textbook--all the readings are online (awesome). Essay-esque assignments are also very short and straightforward. Highly recommended!
